title: COPD Exacerbation – Acute Care Bundle
summary_md: Short, evidence-based bundle for AECOPD in ED/ICU.
steps_json: [{"step": "Assess severity & red flags", "details": "Dyspnea at rest, cyanosis, confusion, RR>30, SpO2<88% RA, hemodynamic instability"}, {"step": "Controlled oxygen", "details": "Titrate to SpO2 88–92%; ABG if CO2 retainer suspected"}, {"step": "Bronchodilators", "details": "SABA + SAMA via MDI/nebulizer; escalate per response"}, {"step": "Systemic steroids", "details": "Prednisone 40 mg PO daily x 5 days (or equivalent); no taper for short course"}, {"step": "Antibiotics (when indicated)", "details": "Give if increased sputum purulence + volume and/or ventilation need; choose Access first per local antibiogram"}, {"step": "Ventilatory support", "details": "Consider NIV for moderate–severe exacerbations with acidosis/hypercapnia; proceed to intubation per criteria"}, {"step": "Adjuncts", "details": "VTE prophylaxis, treat triggers, assess need for admission"}]
red_flags_json: ["pH<7.25 or PaCO2 rising despite NIV", "Refractory hypoxemia despite FiO2/PEEP escalation", "Altered mental status", "Hemodynamic instability"]
